Articles.Content:
My ksp is not heavily modded:

KIS/KAS

Kerbal engineer

kerbal alarm clock

Claws stock bug fixes

I just went to a craft that was in orbit of Minmus for 120 years after i completed the mission. I is an asteroid mover, and was attached to the asteroid when i went to fly it. Once I started flying it, when the engines are activated, the fuel is drawn str8 from the ore, not at all the fuel. Normally one ISRU can not supply 4 atomic engines with enough fuel fast enough to have only ore drawn. Also noticed that when I click "liquid fuel" off, it begins drawing fuel like normal, but upon switching it back off, all fuel in the craft is instantly filled all the way.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/grc87ojvsodf0ft/2015-11-06_00025.jpg?dl=0 look at resources and ISRU status

https://www.dropbox.com/s/sxr3tfrj1rb1nda/2015-11-06_00026.jpg?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/n09fmnup907fbxx/persistent.sfs?dl=0 persistent if you want to look at it. It should be called ore seeker 1.2 or 1.1 and it is in LKO
